column4: I've got sound but no picture with DVDs on Hardy. Anybody know how to fix it?
have you downloaded the livdvdcss2 libraries?
Yes
hehe sorry can't help beyond that...what program are you using to view DVDs?
Tried both Totem and Mplayer. Both have same problem
did you download the w32codecs or w64codecs packages?
No. Intel graphics
I had DVD working Gutsy, so I _know_ it can work
do you have the medibuntu respositories installed?
Yes
how about the gstreamer0.10-plugins-ugly?
Yes
hmm have you tried xine? maybe even installing the libraries required by it could work
I'll try that. But to say I'm disappointed with how difficult this is would be an understatement.
xine-ui
yeah well...legal problems...DRM and all that
It still shouldn't be hard to enter a few manual commands--legal issues or no
I know what you mean and I sympathize with you
I love Ubuntu, but these sorts of issues need to be resolved yesterday for Ubuntu to make traction on the desktop
are you able to play movie files and whatnot?
I think so, but I can check. Xine has no video either
a WMV file just had no video. Hmmmmmm
I think it boils down to video playback of all types except for youtube seems to be broken
xine has the same problem you say?
